doc:
Arthur Mackley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur_Mackley 0 Arthur Mackley (3 July 1865 – 21 December 1926) was an English actor and director of the silent era. He appeared in 151 films between 1910 and 1925. He frequently took the part of a sheriff in Westerns, earning the nickname "Sheriff" Mackley. He also directed 64 films between 1911 and 1915, at least 26 for Reliance-Mutual release.He was born in Portsmouth, Hampshire, England and died in Los Angeles, California. Arthur_Mackley ( 3_July_1865 – 21_December_1926 ) was an_English_actor_and_director of the_silent_era . He appeared in 151_films between 1910_and_1925 . He frequently took the_part of a_sheriff in Westerns , earning the_nickname_"_Sheriff_"_Mackley . He also directed 64_films between 1911_and_1915 , at_least 26 for Reliance-Mutual_release.He was_born in Portsmouth , Hampshire , England and died in Los_Angeles , California .
